name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_5de23538-a8e7-428e-93ec-ad95389dc7b5
text:
rule Local_authentication_Detected {
  

  meta:
    
    author = "TCS Cloud MDR COE team"
    description = "Local_authentication_Detected"
    severity = "High"
    type = "alert"
    mitre_attack_tactic = "Initial access"
    mitre_attack_technique = "valid accounts"

  events:
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Windows"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "4624" or $e.metadata.product_event_type="528"
    $e.metadata.description = "Logon Type:10" or $e.metadata.description = "Logon Type:2"
    $e.principal.user.userid = "Administrator" or $e.principal.user.userid ="Admin" or $e.principal.user.userid="Guest" or $e.principal.user.userid="Root"

  outcome:
    // For a multi-event rule an aggregation function is required
    // e.g., risk_score = max(0)
    // See https://cloud.google.com/chronicle/docs/detection/yara-l-2-0-overview#outcome_conditionals_example_rule
    $risk_score = 60

  condition:
    $e
}
author: TCS Cloud MDR COE team
